Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The electrochemical cyclic voltammetry ( CV ) curve of the PBDT-TDPP-S film coated on a platinum electrode is shown in Figure S3 ( see Supporting Information ) , and the electrochemical data are also summarized in Table 2.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| CV |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| platinum electrode |
| Figure S3 |
| Supporting Information |
| Table 2 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| CV |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |

The entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" are:

* "platinum electrode" (this is a specific type of electrode, not a material property)
* "Figure S3" (this is a figure number, not a material property)
* "Supporting Information" (this is a general term, not a specific material property)
* "Table 2" (this is a table number, not a material property)
